entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
